DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to determine if there is a correlation between reductions in corneal staining and improvements in corneal barrier function.
DOC.brief_title: Barrier Function Measurement in Dry Eye Patients After Using Systane Ultra for 30 Days
DOC.criteria: Patients must have moderate corneal staining and exhibit a need to use artificial tears. Patients can not participate in any other ophthalmic drug or device clinical trial within 30 days of the baseline visit.
